plot: Monroe threatens to kill everyone in his and Miles' hometown unless Miles gives himself up to him. Aaron and Rachel enter the Plains Nation, and Aaron sees Priscilla.

Miles and the troops provided by the Georgia Federation have been having a good deal of success and Monroe travels to their hometown where he threatens to kill every living soul unless Miles gives himself up to him. He says he will start the killing with Emma, a woman they both loved long ago. Monroe hasn't returned to his hometown since his family died and Emma has an important piece of information for him. Rachel and Aaron travel west, crossing the Mississippi to the Plains Nation, arriving at La Grange, Missouri. In the marketplace, Aaron sees someone from his past. When they finally meet face to face, the reception isn't what he had hoped for.—garykmcd
